name: DragonakeR (Commodore 64)
description:
DRAGONAKER (Commodore 64)

Dragonaker, is a mix between a ship shooter, in the purest classic style and one in the first person, similar to games like Combat school and its shooting range in which we will control our dragon and his sights to advance. We have defined it as “Fire and fly” style.

Game for: Commodore 64 / TheC64 mini / TheC64 Maxi

ARGUMENT

Dragonaker, our dragon, wants to go home, but what seemed like a pleasant walk turns into a great adventure. Mines, dragons, rain clouds, electric clouds, winged beings, etc. prevent the way. We will have to break through with the power of the shot of its jaws to finally face our great enemy, the great green dragon. But be careful! Not all clouds are white and vaporous and can be traversed. There are also thick gray clouds that we will not be able to pass, just the ones that Dragonaker does not feel good at all. So it is best to avoid them.

PHASES

The game has five phases, four of them with their final boss and for all this we will have only 5 lives to complete Dragonaker.

Phase 1: Cloud zone 1
Phase 2: Cloud Zones 2
Phase 3: Fog zone
Phase 4: Training zone
Phase 5: Cloud zone 3

ADITIONAL INFORMATION

The game is developed with seuck, a maker that facilitates the creation of games but at the same time limits the options. However, to overcome these limitations and create it with that classic and functional aspect, we have implemented improvements to it to achieve what we wanted.

Originally published from : www.commodorespain.es

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS

This game is prepared to play on a Commodore 64. using a Tapauino device. It can also be played on the C664 mini or maxi, or using compatible hardware such as emulation (Vice, CCS64, C64 forever, etc.).  Download the file and run the .tap file.
